@Comment: Chi directs most of his own activities and works mostly on his own. Mot watches and offers suggestions from time to time. There is some talk about which objects are magnetic and Mot and Chi mention at the beginning of the activity that the Chi has a magnet set. Toward the end of the activity Chi's younger brother comes in and Chi attempts to engage him in the activity as well by showing him how to use the wand to pick up objects.. Video tape does not start until later; transcripts until then is solely from audio
